mapper.sql: select * from house left join house_generalize on house.id = house_generalize.hid left join renttype on house.rid = renttype.rid left join specifictype on house.sid = specifictype.sid left join housetype on specifictype.id = housetype.id left join house_bed on house.id = house_bed.hid left join bedtype on house_bed.bid = bedtype.bid left join house_sup on house.id = house_sup.hid LEFT JOIN supporting on house_sup.sid = supporting.id left join house_many on house.id = house_many.hid LEFT JOIN house_other on house.id = house_other.hid LEFT JOIN othertypes on house_other.oid = othertypes.id left JOIN house_address on house.id = house_address.hid left join house_rules on house.id = house_rules.hid left join house_require on house.id = house_require.hid
mapper.select: select house.*,l.*,r.*,h.hname htname,h.icon hticon,h.commission,hg.area,hadd.city hadcity from house left join landlord l on l.lid=house.lid left join renttype r on r.rid=house.rid left join housetype h on h.id=house.sid LEFT JOIN house_generalize hg on hg.hid=house.id LEFT JOIN house_address hadd on hadd.hid=house.id where l.realname like #{_name}

select h.*,l.*,r.*,ht.id,ht.hname htname,ht.commission,ht.icon hticon, hg.id hgid,hg.area,hg.rarea,hg.cohabit,hg.bedroom,hg.wc,hg.drawing, hg.kitchen,hg.balcony,hg.wctype,hg.count,hb.id hbid,hb.bid,hb.count hbcount, bed.bname,bed.parentid,hs.id hsid,hs.sid hssid,hs.state hsstate,sp.id spid, sp.sname,sp.parentid spparentid,sp.icon spicon,hm.id hmid,hm.workday, hm.weekend,hm.Holidays,hm.hid, ho.id hoid,ho.hid,ho.oid, ho.count hocount,ho.many,oth.id othid,oth.oname,had.id hadid,had.city hadcity, had.plot,had.card,had.address hadaddress,had.explains,hr.id hrid,hr.liblecount, hr.days,hr.atcheck,hr.lastcheck,hr.rules,hr.uid,hr.checkout,un.id unid, un.uname,un.uvarchar,un.uimage,hre.id hreid,hre.rid hrerid,hre.state hrestate, req.id reqid,req.rname
from house h left join landlord l on l.lid=h.lid left join renttype r on r.rid=h.rid left join housetype ht on ht.id=h.sid left join house_generalize hg on hg.hid=h.id left join house_bed hb on hb.hid=h.id left join Bedtype bed on bed.bid=hb.bid left join house_sup hs on hs.hid=h.id left join supporting sp on sp.id=hs.sid left join house_many hm on hm.hid=h.id left join house_other ho on ho.hid=h.id left join othertypes oth on oth.id=ho.oid left join house_address had on had.hid=h.id LEFT JOIN house_rules hr on hr.hid=h.id LEFT JOIN unsubscribe un on un.id=hr.uid LEFT JOIN house_require hre on hre.hid=h.id LEFT JOIN requiretype req on req.id=hre.rid where h.id=#{hid}
